examples.example: 在这万象更新的季节里，处处充满着生机与活力。

translate.english: In this season of all things renewing, everywhere is full of vitality and vigor.

examples.example: 万事如意是我们对他人最美好的祝福。

translate.english: All the best is the best wish we give to others.

examples.example: 在这万紫千红的花园中，蝴蝶在翩翩起舞。

translate.english: In this colorful garden, butterflies are dancing gracefully.
